/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with gray buildings, their red and yellow signs adding a splash of color to the scene. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
